DOC.brief_summary: This trial is designed to provide data about feasibility and safety of short-term treatment with the low-molecular-weight heparin certoparin in patients with persistent nonvalvular atrial fibrillation
DOC.brief_title: Atrial Fibrillation Feasibility Certoparin Trial - AFFECT
DOC.criteria: persistent AF (electrical cardioversion is planned) written informed consent acute clinical signs of venous thromboembolism current oral anticoagulation indication for medical cardioversion
